alert.note: Alert for San Joaquin River Canyon (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 2:59PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet. For the Winter Weather Advisory, wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 15 inches. * WHERE...San Joaquin River Canyon. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 PM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
